productInfo.title: Nike 12-Piece Sift Set
productInfo.subtitle: Baby 12-Piece Boxed Gift Set
productInfo.fullTitle: Nike 12-Piece Sift Set Baby 12-Piece Boxed Gift Set
productInfo.productDescription: The perfect gift for the smallest athletes, this set contains multiple head-to-toe coordinated looks. The short sleeve bodysuits have lapped shoulders and snap closures at the crotch make changing and dressing easy, the matching bibs have hook-and-loop closures for a comfy fit. The cozy, footed coverall has a full-zip closure to make changing, dressing and layering easy. The rib knit pants are tapered and have an encased elastic waistband for a comfy fit. The handy burp cloths help protect your little as well as your own clothes from accidents.

body: The bodysuits have lapped shouders and snap closures at the crotch to make changing and dressing easy.
The bibs have hook-and-loop closures for comfy wear.
The coverall has a full-zip closure and footed bottoms add extra warmth.
Includes 2 short sleeve bodysuits, 2 beanies, 2 pairs of booties, 2 burp cloths, a pair of pants and a footed coverall.
Beanie/Bodysuits/Bibs/Coverall/Pants: 60% Cotton, 40% Polyester; Booties: 62% Cotton, 34% Polyester, 4% Elastane; Burp Cloths: 80% Cotton, 20% Polyester

CN.pdp_sale_price_message_first: Price description (this description is valid only when price comparison occurs)
CN.pdp_sale_price_message_second: Crossed the price: the price of the cross may be the price of the counter price tag or genuine retail price guide price or the goods have been displayed in the sales price, etc., for your reference only. Uncorrected price: The price of the unmarked price is the sales price of the goods on the platform. The specific transaction price may be changed by the customer using the coupon, the gift card and so on. Finally, the price of the order settlement page shall prevail

JP.shippingMessage:
Returns are free for both Members and guests (only for items that are unused and within 30 days upon delivery. Exceptions apply).
About Returns

Members get free standard shipping (for guests, only for purchases over ¥15,000) and discounted expedited shipping.
Join Us or Sign In

KR.shippingMessage:
Standard Shipping 

• Delivery areas: nationwide (excluding some areas)

• Shipping cost: Free shipping

• Delivery period: within approximately 3 business days after payment.

• Nike does not offer exchange services.

Learn more about Shipping & Delivery

Learn more about Returns


Sameday Delivery

• Hours of use: Payment by 10:30am, arriving on the same day (excluding Sundays and holidays)

• Service area: Seoul, Gwacheon, Uiwang, Gunpo, Suwon, Seongnam, Anyang, Suji-gu, Giheung-gu, Bucheon-si, Jung-dong, Sangdong, and Simgok-dong

• Service cost: KRW 5,000

Learn more

 

A/S 

• A/S for products purchased on Nike Online can only be received by wire at Nike Korea Customer Center (080-022-0182).

Learn more

Bangkok:
  • Standard shipping: Delivered in 3-6 business days

messages.pdp_gcLargeOrderModalMainText: Just e-mail {emailLink} for more information or call Nike directly at 1-877-220-6453 for assistance. You will receive a reply or call-back during Nike corporate business hours (Monday through Friday, 8 AM – 5 PM Pacific Time, excluding holiday). Please do not send credit card information over email.

messages.pdp_launchCSGuestIntro: Create or sign in to your free Nike Member account for a chance to buy this product the moment it's released. {learnMoreButtonText}
messages.pdp_launchCSMemberIntro: Nike Members like you are the only ones who have a chance to purchase this product when it's released. {learnMoreButtonText}
messages.pdp_launchCheckoutErrorBody: There was a problem processing your payment.  Check your payment information and try again.
messages.pdp_launchCheckoutNotLoggedIn: Your session has expired.  Please refresh and login to continue.
messages.pdp_launchCheckoutNumberNotVerified: Your session has expired.  Please refresh and login to continue.
messages.pdp_launchGetInLineTitle: Download the Nike App and get notified.
messages.pdp_launchInLineBodyModal: If your turn comes up, we'll complete your order.
messages.pdp_launchLMModalBePreparedSubBullet: Make sure you're signed in to your Nike Member account and ready when the product launches.
messages.pdp_launchLMModalGuestJoinSubBullet: Line Checkout is available only to Nike Members. Not a Member? {JoinForFree}
messages.pdp_launchLMModalLineOne: To make sure Nike Members have an equal chance to purchase high-demand items on our site, we use a Line Checkout system.
messages.pdp_launchLMModalLineThree: Wait times vary based on demand. Limit one item per Nike Member.
messages.pdp_launchLMModalLineTwo: If your chosen size and color is available when you're selected, we'll process your order. If your selection sells out before that, we'll let you know.
messages.pdp_launchLMModalSecondTitleSubtitle: Here's how to make your Line Checkout experience as easy as possible:
messages.pdp_launchLMModalUpdateProfileSubBullet: Make sure your shipping and payment information is current.
messages.pdp_launchLMModalVerifyMobileSubBullet: This layer of added security helps keep the Line Checkout process fair.
messages.pdp_launchWinnerBody: Congratulations on your purchase. A confirmation email is on the way.
messages.pdp_launch_unavailable: This product is no longer available.
